items.title: Bitcoin’s Quantum Risk Is Real – One Solution Might Start with Taproot

items.title: Ark and Spark: The Channel Factories We’ve Been Waiting For
items.excerpt: Visions of future technology are often prescient about the broad strokes while flubbing the details. The tablets in “ 2001: A Space Odyssey ” do indeed look like iPads, but you never see the astronauts paying for subscriptions or wasting hours on Candy Crush.
